subject: Doping (Sports)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Cyclists George Hincapie, Christian Vande Velde, Tom Danielson and David Zabriskie, who testified in the doping case against Lance Armstrong, issued statements about their own involvement in the practice.
snippet: Cyclists George Hincapie, Christian Vande Velde, Tom Danielson and David Zabriskie, who testified in the doping case against Lance Armstrong, issued statements about their own involvement in the practice.
